snippet.title: I Am Your President – Story Trailer
snippet.description:
The official story trailer for the upcoming video game I Am Your President – the narrative strategy simulator from President Studio. Coming in October 2020.
✅ Add the game to your Steam Wishlist: https://bit.ly/3csYtfA

-- About I Am Your President --

Play as another US president! Decide the fate of the world and run the country any way you like. Do you wish to start a war or make peace? Take care of the poorest or support the capitalists? Advocate for gun rights or stand against them? It is all up to you!

☑️ Personalize your political views 
☑️ Wisely choose your advisors and cabinet members. 
☑️ Every decision matters – be careful!
☑️ Make friends or enemies.
☑️ Use social media and read the news.
☑️ Provide sustainable development, or watch your country fall into chaos.
☑️ Simply try to survive as the President.

Don’t forget to subscribe to the President Studio Channel!

-- Follow us here --

Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/844980/I_Am_Your_President/
Discord: https://discord.gg/gjQmtRj
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/PresidentStudioGames/
Twitter: https://twitter.com/im_ur_president 
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/iamyourpresident_thegame/
Website: https://president-studio.com/

#IAmYourPresident #IAmYourPresidentPrologue
